<title>The Lower Canyon Rafting + Cliffside Zipline Package</title>
<meta name="description" content="Soar from cliff-face to cliff-face on our thrilling Cliffside Zipline tour, and blast down the Lower Canyon of Clear Creek and enjoy one of the most continuous and difficult sections of whitewater rafting the Colorado Rockies has to offer." />
